about.title: About ArtEvoke
about.paragraph1: This thesis explores how artificial intelligence can support non-drug interventions for people living with Alzheimer's disease through the use of visual stimuli and art. We present the development and integration of ArtEvoke, a prototype platform that combines large multimodal models (LMMs), large language models (LLMs), and embedding-based vector search to connect personal stories with curated artworks.
about.paragraph2: Building upon foundational research from a Master's thesis by Augusto B. V. Silva and Marc Bejjani at Université Catholique de Louvain, which benchmarked the core AI models, this work focuses on integrating these components into a functional prototype and introducing a novel clinical evaluation framework. Designed to assist memory recall and cognitive engagement, ArtEvoke generates personalized visual narratives or retrieves relevant paintings based on the user's story. A key contribution of this thesis is the platform's ability to support structured clinical sessions, enabling practitioners to capture and "score" patient responses to provide a metric for engagement.
about.paragraph3: The prototype is intended for testing in future therapeutic and research settings as a scalable support tool. We evaluate the integrated system's retrieval effectiveness using FAISS and its user interaction design with a focus on accessibility. These findings highlight the potential of AI tools to support scalable and measurable cognitive stimulation in dementia care.
about.paragraph4: This work was undertaken at the University of São Paulo by Augusto B. V. Silva and Vinicius Alvarenga.

home.heroDescription: An innovative platform that connects art and memory through AI. Discover artworks that resonate with your stories or explore art to create new narratives.
home.loginPrompt: To start using these modes, please log in to your account.
home.memoryStep1: Tell us a story or memory that you'd like to explore
home.memoryStep2: The AI divides your story into meaningful sections
home.memoryStep3: For each section, the system searches for related artworks
home.memoryStep4: Choose the image that best matches each section of your story
home.memoryExampleStory: The city towers glimmered above me like steel giants. I wandered toward the quiet outskirts where the noise softened. Sunlight spilled across open fields, turning everything warm and golden. Wildflowers brushed my legs as colors replaced concrete. And at last, a still blue lake opened before me.
home.memoryExampleDesc: The AI divides your story into sections and finds related images:
home.memorySection1: The city towers glimmered above me like steel giants. I wandered toward the quiet outskirts where the noise softened. Sunlight spilled across open fields, turning everything warm and golden.
home.memorySection2: Sunlight spilled across open fields, turning everything warm and golden. Wildflowers brushed my legs as colors replaced concrete. And at last, a still blue lake opened before me.
home.artStep1: Enter keywords related to themes you want to explore
home.artStep2: The system searches for artworks matching your keywords
home.artStep3: Select the images that resonate with you
home.artStep4: The AI generates a personalized story connecting your chosen artworks
home.artSearchDesc: The system finds artworks related to your keywords:
home.artGenerationDesc: Based on the selected images, the AI generates a story:
home.artExampleStory: In the vibrant city of Paris, newcomers arrived in 1934, carrying dreams and stories from their homeland. Among them was La Verja, a spirited young artist whose eyes danced with the colors of her memories. As they settled into their cozy apartment, the city buzzed with life and excitement. La Verja found solace in painting, capturing the essence of Paris in every stroke. One sunny afternoon, she painted a lively scene of the Seine River, with boats gliding past the Eiffel Tower. Her artwork soon became a cherished piece in the neighborhood, bringing joy to many.

artExploration.title: Art Exploration Instructions
artExploration.description1: The art exploration tool allows you to search for art pieces by typing in some keywords. Our AI model will return some paintings from our database, and you can then select the one that you find most interesting, and the model will then generate a story based on it.
artExploration.description2: Finally, if the generated story is not to your liking, you can choose to regenerate a new story, or start over.
artExploration.description3: Before submitting, you can play with 2 options
artExploration.instruction1: You can select the language that you used in order to help our model correct the spelling and translate to english
artExploration.instruction2: You can choose one of 3 databases for our model to search from, giving you a wider array of results
artExploration.enterKeywords: Enter some keywords to search for art!
artExploration.imageSelectionDesc: Our AI model chose these paintings as the ones most resembling your input. Please **select one or more** of them to generate a story. Selected images will remain chosen across multiple searches.
artExploration.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one image to generate a story.
artExploration.loginToSave: Please log in to save the story to your account.
artExploration.saveFailed: Failed to save the story. Please try again.
artExploration.confirmClearSelections: Are you sure you want to clear all selections?

memoryReconstruction.description: The memory reconstruction tool allows you to input a story or a memory (or part of it). After submitting the text, our AI model will segment the text and suggest the best matching painting per section from the selected database, which can hopefully help you remember more details of the story. If you are not satisfied with the given result, you can click on the "Show 5 images per section" button to generate even more images.
memoryReconstruction.optionsIntro: After inputting the text, you are given 3 options to play with.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.text: This platform allows users to share personal stories, which are then transformed into sequences of images in collaboration with partner museums. The goal of this test is to evaluate and improve the platform's usability, relevance, and impact based on participant feedback.

voluntary.title: Voluntary Participation
voluntary.text: Your participation is completely voluntary. You may stop using the platform or withdraw your participation at any time, without any consequences.

information.title: Information Collected
information.intro: To participate, we will ask only for the following basic information:
information.additional: Additionally, the stories you share and the feedback you provide during your use of the platform may be collected. No personal identification data (such as full name, address, or contact information) will be required.

dataUse.title: How Your Data Will Be Used
dataUse.text: Your contributions will be used only for research and development purposes, specifically to improve the platform experience and evaluate how effectively it supports storytelling and cultural engagement.
dataUse.noSale: No data will be sold, shared, or used for commercial or targeted advertising purposes.

conflicts.title: Conflicts of Interest
conflicts.text: By agreeing to participate, you confirm that:
conflicts.noConflicts: You have no conflicts of interest related to this research or platform.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.text: Your participation will remain anonymous. Any results or insights shared publicly will not contain information that could identify you.

agreement.title: Consent Agreement
agreement.intro: By checking the box below and/or continuing to use this platform, I declare that:
agreement.age: I am over the age required to consent in my country/region.
agreement.understand: I understand how my data will be used.
agreement.noConflicts: I have no conflicts of interest regarding the use or evaluation of this platform.
agreement.agree: I agree to the terms stated above.

checkbox.label: I agree and consent to participate
